profile.help:
All commands related to your profile.
Running any subcommand will initialise your profile.
Running without a command will show your profile, or that of a user you specify.
Examples:
[p]profile Starwort#6129
[p]profile
[p]profile Starwort

fruit.set: Your town's starting fruit has been set.
fruit.invalid: That is not a valid starting fruit in your locale!
fruit.help:
Add your town's starting fruit to your profile.
Example:
[p]profile fruit Apples

dream.set: Your town's dream address has been set.
dream.invalid: That is not a valid dream address!
dream.help:
Add your town's dream address to your profile.
Example:
[p]profile dream 6C00 - 00F9 - A575

3ds.set: Your 3DS friend code has been added.
3ds.invalid: That is not a valid 3DS friend code.
3ds.help:
Add your 3DS friend code to your profile.
Example:
[p]profile 3ds 0791 - 2985 - 5401

fc.set: Your Nintendo Switch friend code has been added.
fc.invalid: That is not a valid Nintendo Switch friend code.
fc.help:
Add your friend code to your profile.
Example:
[p]profile fc SW-1519-8784-6001

hacker.set: Your hacker status has been set to: {}
hacker.help:
Are you a hacker?
Example:
[p]profile hacker yes

furniture.set: You now have {} complete furniture sets.
furniture.many: There are only 37 sets of furniture!
furniture.help:
Add how many furniture sets you've completed to your profile.
Example:
[p]profile furniture 24

songs.help:
Add the number of songs you've unlocked to your profile.
Example:
[p]profile songs 10

badges.help:
Add the number of badges you've collected to your profile.
Example:
[p]profile badges 42

villager.set: Your favourite villager has been set.
villager.invalid: That is not a valid villager in your locale.
villager.help:
Add your favourite villager to your profile.
Example:
[p]profile villager Fauna

pwp.set: You now have {} completed Public Works Projects.
pwp.many: You can only have 30 Public Works Projects in your town!
pwp.help:
Add the number of Public Works Projects you have completed to your profile.
Example:
[p]profile pwps 5

locale.help:
Check or set your locale. Defaults to `EN`
Example:
[p]profile locale en

ign.set: Your in-game name has been set.
ign.long: Your in-game name can only be 10 characters long!
ign.help:
Set your in-game name.
Example:
[p]profile ign Starwort

town.set: Your town name has been set.
town.long: Your town name can only be 10 characters long!
town.help:
Set your town's name.
Example:
[p]profile town Arcadia
